Reviews.Title: Great camera for the money
Reviews.Author: Karen Francis
Reviews.Content: I had bought this same camera last Christmas for my husband and he loves it and when my daughter saw it, she loved it too.  So this year I bought it for her.  The only thing that I was disappointed with was as soon as she opened it and took things out of the box, the strap on the camera case was broken ! She has looked around to find a replacement strap, but hasn't been able to find one, so we will just get her another case.....It's just too bad that you spend all that money and something has to come broken!

ProductInfo.Features:
This kit includes 11 items, Camera & lens includes all manufacturer's supplied accessories & Warranty, Additional accessories are backed with Hot Deals Electronics 1 year 100% Satisfaction Guarantee
Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with HD Movie Mode (Body) - Canon EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens
16 Gigabyte SDHC Secure Digital Memory Card - SD USB Memory Card Reader - 12 Slot Foldable Memory Card Case
Additional LP-E10 Rechargeable Lithium ion Replacement Battery Pack - SLR Camera Fast Access Carrying Case with Pockets & Neck Strap
UV (Ultraviolet) Protection Filter - 5pc. Deluxe Lens Care & Cleaning Kit - Package of LCD Screen Protectors - HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth (the most effective way to clean all optical surfaces)
ProductInfo.Name: Canon EOS Rebel T3 12.2 MP CMOS Digital SLR Camera with EF-S 18-55mm f/3.5-5.6 IS II Zoom Lens + 9pc Bundle 16GB Accessory Kit w/ HeroFiber® Ultra Gentle Cleaning Cloth
